Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way.
Coffee, Pastries...and Solar! Attend a Free Solar Breakfast Seminar. <[[http://desolarbreakfastseries.eventbrite.com]]>
Did you know you could brew your coffee using the power of the sun? We’re hosting Free Solar Breakfast Seminars to show you how you can use solar energy’s potential to save money on your home energy expenses.
Our seminars are ideal for Maryland homeowners who want to know if going solar is right for them. Bring a friend (or many friends)!
Free Solar Breakfast Seminar February 13 | 10:30 AM–12:00 PM
Direct Energy Solar’s Maryland Office: 7101 Riverwood Drive | Columbia, MD 21046
Reserve Your Spot, and Bring Some Friends! <[[http://desolarbreakfastseries.eventbrite.com]]>
What Do You Get? • Complimentary breakfast of coffee, pastries, and fruit • A short presentation by our solar experts • A Q&A session—get all of your solar questions answered! • $50 gift card(1) for workshop attendees who complete an appointment with one of our consultants after the workshop
What Will We Cover? • Why go solar? • Is solar right for your home? • Financing options • Information on the state of the solar industry, environmental benefits, and the latest technologies. • Local and federal incentives • How to choose an installer
RSVP Today to Reserve Your Spot! <[[http://desolarbreakfastseries.eventbrite.com]]>
Can’t make it on February 13? Don’t worry, there’s more dates coming up!
